attributes.action: Make it illegal for businesses in the U.K to refuse Cash as payment.
attributes.additional_details:
The freedom of choice has been taken away by businesses who have suddenly decided to refuse Cash. When the Card Machine Payment System breaks down or the Wi-fi stops working, there will be no other ways to pay and it is the UK Public and smaller businesses who will suffer.

The UK Public named in this petition would like the Government to make it illegal for businesses in the U.K to refuse Cash as payment.
attributes.background: Make it illegal for businesses in the U.K to refuse Cash as payment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions:

Make it illegal for retail and hospitality businesses to refuse cash as payment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653396

Require all businesses and public services to accept cash payments:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654438
